# Ha Dong‚Äôs Post

Ha Dong

 Report this post

I‚Äôm happy to share that I have been accepted to Break Through Tech AI at MIT Schwarzman College of Computing! Starting this June, I will be joining an 18-month fellowship to further technical skills critical for machine learning and AI applications, which I hope to integrate into my future research career in life sciences and healthcare. I owe a huge thank you to Arjun Kejriwal and Pranjal Chalise for introducing me to this incredible opportunity! The application for this year‚Äôs program is open until March 18! You can learn more and apply here:

data.title: Ha Dong's Post - LinkedIn
data.snippet:
Agree & Join LinkedIn

# Ha Dong‚Äôs Post

View profile for Ha Dong

I'm happy to share that I have been admitted to the Caltech 2024 Summer Undergraduate Research Fellowship. This summer, I'll work at the Meister Lab at Caltech's Neuroscience Department on a project focused on neural state encoding for foraging and defensive behaviors in mice. My gratitude goes to Prof. J. Roche, Prof. R. Alvarado, and Prof. S. Turgeon for their tremendous support during my application process and the love and support from my friends and family.

data.title: Hao Dong - Global Research Immersion Program for Young Scientists
data.snippet: My research field is the chemical physics of complex systems, which focuses on the development of multi-scale theoretical computational methods

data.title: Haoyu Dong at Microsoft Research
data.snippet:
I had the pleasure of co-founding the first Table Representation Learning (TRL) Workshop at NeurIPS (opens in new tab) in 2022 and have continued to co-organize it in 2023 and 2024. I also served on the steering committee for the Tabular Data Analysis (TaDA) workshop at VLDB‚Äô23. Recently, I co-presented a tutorial on ‚ÄúLarge Language Models for Tabular Data‚Äù (opens in new tab) at the SIGIR‚Äô24 conference and gave a keynote on ‚ÄúSpreadsheet Intelligence and Tabular Data Analytics‚Äù at the VLDB‚Äô2024 TaDA workshop.

### Research areas

### Research groups

### Contact Haoyu Dong

Follow us:

Share this page: [...] ## Global

Portrait of Haoyu Dong

# Haoyu Dong

Senior Researcher

## About

I am Haoyu, a Senior Researcher at Microsoft Research and AI, specializing in LLMs for advancing table understanding and reasoning. My work spans both foundational research and practical applications in enterprise settings. Our paper Neural Formatting for Spreadsheet Tables was nominated for Best Full Research Paper at CIKM 2020, and our more recent project, SpreadsheetLLM, was featured as Hugging Face Paper of the Day (1st for the day (opens in new tab), 2nd for the month (opens in new tab)).
